languages.text: {n}Толпа людей, для которых процветание равнозначно дюжине пищевых пайков, отвечает вам восторженным воем. Их разумы уносятся по дороге ваших слов к светлому будущему, в котором у них будет... все!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Толпа людей, для которых процветание равнозначно дюжине пищевых пайков, отвечает вам восторженным воем. Их разумы уносятся по дороге ваших слов к светлому будущему, в котором у них будет... все!{/n}

languages.text: {n}The crowd of people for whom prosperity amounts to a dozen food rations responds with enraptured howling. Their minds are carried away along the road of your words to a brighter future, where they will have... everything!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Толпа людей, для которых процветание равнозначно дюжине пищевых пайков, отвечает вам восторженным воем. Их разумы уносятся по дороге ваших слов к светлому будущему, в котором у них будет... все!{/n}

{n}The crowd of people for whom prosperity amounts to a dozen food rations responds with enraptured howling. Their minds are carried away along the road of your words to a brighter future, where they will have... everything!{/n}

languages.text: {n}繁栄によって1ダースの食料配給がもたらされる群衆の人々は、狂喜乱舞の咆哮で応える。人民の心はあなたの言葉から導かれる明るい未来で我を忘れている。我々は…全てを手にするのだ！と{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd of people for whom prosperity amounts to a dozen food rations responds with enraptured howling. Their minds are carried away along the road of your words to a brighter future, where they will have... everything!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}繁栄によって1ダースの食料配給がもたらされる群衆の人々は、狂喜乱舞の咆哮で応える。人民の心はあなたの言葉から導かれる明るい未来で我を忘れている。我々は…全てを手にするのだ！と{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的一席话引起了无数人欣喜若狂的欢呼。对于那些人来说，富足原本不过是足够撑十几天的口粮，但你的豪言壮语全让他们看到了更加光明的未来。在那里，他们……无所不能，应有尽有！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd of people for whom prosperity amounts to a dozen food rations responds with enraptured howling. Their minds are carried away along the road of your words to a brighter future, where they will have... everything!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的一席话引起了无数人欣喜若狂的欢呼。对于那些人来说，富足原本不过是足够撑十几天的口粮，但你的豪言壮语全让他们看到了更加光明的未来。在那里，他们……无所不能，应有尽有！{/n}

languages.text: {n}El gentío, para el que la prosperidad consiste en tener una docena de raciones de comida, responde con aullidos extasiados. En sus mentes, siguen el camino de tus palabras hacia un futuro más brillante en el que tendrán... ¡de todo!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd of people for whom prosperity amounts to a dozen food rations responds with enraptured howling. Their minds are carried away along the road of your words to a brighter future, where they will have... everything!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El gentío, para el que la prosperidad consiste en tener una docena de raciones de comida, responde con aullidos extasiados. En sus mentes, siguen el camino de tus palabras hacia un futuro más brillante en el que tendrán... ¡de todo!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parmi la foule, ceux pour qui la prospérité se limite généralement à une dizaine de rations de nourriture se mettent à hurler de plus belle, galvanisés par vos paroles qui ouvrent la voie vers un avenir meilleur où ils auront... tout !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd of people for whom prosperity amounts to a dozen food rations responds with enraptured howling. Their minds are carried away along the road of your words to a brighter future, where they will have... everything!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parmi la foule, ceux pour qui la prospérité se limite généralement à une dizaine de rations de nourriture se mettent à hurler de plus belle, galvanisés par vos paroles qui ouvrent la voie vers un avenir meilleur où ils auront... tout !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Menschen, für die Wohlstand ein Dutzend Essensrationen bedeutet, antworten mit begeistertem Jubel. Ihre Fantasie beschreitet die Straße deiner Worte, hin zu einer besseren Zukunft, und dann werden sie ... alles haben!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd of people for whom prosperity amounts to a dozen food rations responds with enraptured howling. Their minds are carried away along the road of your words to a brighter future, where they will have... everything!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Menschen, für die Wohlstand ein Dutzend Essensrationen bedeutet, antworten mit begeistertem Jubel. Ihre Fantasie beschreitet die Straße deiner Worte, hin zu einer besseren Zukunft, und dann werden sie ... alles haben!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Refah anlayışı bir günlük yemekle kısıtlı insan kalabalığı, aşka gelmiş bir ulumayla karşılık veriyor. Zihinleri; sözlerinle eşliğinde, her ama her şeye sahip olacakları parlak geleceği düşlüyor!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd of people for whom prosperity amounts to a dozen food rations responds with enraptured howling. Their minds are carried away along the road of your words to a brighter future, where they will have... everything!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Refah anlayışı bir günlük yemek ile kısıtlı insan kalabalığı, aşka gelmiş bir ulumayla karşılık veriyor. Zihinleri, sözlerinin yolunda açtığı, her şeye ama her şeye sahip olacakları parlak geleceğe gidiyor!{/n}
